question: Identify the floral formula of plant belonging to potato family (Solanaceae).
explanation: Solanaceae formula: Actinomorphic ($\oplus$), Bisexual, Calyx 5 fused ($K_{(5)}$), Corolla 5 fused ($C_{(5)}$), Androecium 5 epipetalous ($A_5$ attached to C), Gynoecium bicarpellary syncarpous superior ($\underline{G}_{(2)}$).
